application.summary: DVB video editing and demultiplexing tool

description.p: European digital radio & television uses the DVB standard to broadcast its data. Project-X gives you a look behind the transmissions and tries its best to handle & repair many stream types and shows what went wrong on reception. It's not meant for a regular use but for test and learning conditions.
At the moment, Project-X does not include support for H.264 (HD video) content.
